Comment: If you mean a populist candidate, then yes. . .   Way back in 2016.  Bernie was an outsider and the DNC didn't like him. The DNC favoured Hilary who lost to Trump.  Funnily enough, Bernie Sanders won several of the same states in the primary that swung the election to Trump in the general that year.  It's certainly not a sure thing, but had the DNC been more supportive during the primary and given Bernie a fairer shot, he may very well have defeated Trump before this mess started.
